if.test: area!= 0 and office !=0 and area != null and office != null

trim.if: and rb.id IN ( SELECT ull.resident_id FROM update_resident_log ull WHERE ull.user_id IN ( SELECT su.id FROM system_user su WHERE su.area_id IN ( SELECT ad.id FROM administrative_division ad where ad.id = #{area} OR ad.parentid = #{area}) OR su.organization_id = #{office}))

mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into RESIDENTS_INFO( id,bid_util,bank_card_number,card_type,issuers_card_name,issuers_card_code,issuing_serial_number,issuers_card_certificate,issuing_time,name,sex,national_code,birthday,identity_number,card_validity_period,self_phone,medical_payment,house_address,now_address,contact_name,contact_relation,contact_phone,education_level_code,marital_status_code,professional_code,social_security_num,issuing_bank,card_status,chip_num,is_floating,office_id,area_id,card_sync_status1,card_sync_status2,card_sync_status3,del_falg,deleteor,delete_date,creator,create_date,updator,update_date ) values (#{id},#{bidUtil},#{bankCardNumber},#{cardType},#{issuersCardName},#{issuersCardCode},#{issuingSerialNumber},#{issuersCardCertificate},#{issuingTime},#{name},#{sex},#{nationalCode},#{birthday},#{identityNumber},#{cardValidityPeriod},#{selfPhone},#{medicalPayment},#{houseAddress},#{nowAddress},#{contactName},#{contactRelation},#{contactPhone},#{educationLevelCode},#{maritalStatusCode},#{professionalCode},#{socialSecurityNum},#{issuingBank},#{cardStatus},#{chipNum},#{isFloating},#{officeId},#{areaId},#{cardSyncStatus1},#{cardSyncStatus2},#{cardSyncStatus3},#{delFalg},#{deleteor},#{deleteDate},#{creator},#{createDate},#{updator},#{updateDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT rb.id, rb.name, rb.identity_number, rb.bank_card_number, rb.create_date, rb.update_date, rb.bid_util, rb.issuing_time, rb.card_status, rb.is_floating, rb.social_security_num, rb.issuers_card_name, rb.card_type FROM RESIDENTS_INFO rb
SELECT count(rb.del_falg = 0 OR NULL) FROM RESIDENTS_INFO rb
SELECT su.name FROM system_user su where id=#{id}
SELECT ad.name FROM administrative_division ad where id=#{id}
SELECT am.administrative_name as name FROM administrative_management am where id=#{id}
